short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pull down the shade on your tab to protect your privacy during screensharing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever accidentally revealed a bit too much about what you were browsing during a screensharing session? Then this extension is for you! It allows you to cover the contents of any tab (or all tabs) using shortcut keys.
